title: nee daya raadhaa
sahitya:
nI daya rAda 





anupallavi



kadanE vArevaru kalyANarAma 





caraNam 1

nannu brOcuvarilanu nADE teliya ina vamsha nI kinta tAmasamA





caraNam 2



anniTikinadhikAruDani nE bogaDitE mannincitE nIdu mahimaku

takkuva



caraNam 3





rAma rAma rAma tyAgarAja hrtsadana nAmadi tallaDillE nyAyamA vEgamE
